Welcome to IDMatch’s documentation!¶

Image and DSM Matching (IDMatch) is a software that derives surface velocities from an image or a digital surface model (DSM) pair.

This website gives you the following main information:

The Introduction section gives you the overview and the purpose of the software and present the results obtained from a case study. The section Using IDMatch is more practical and explains detailed steps for the software installation as well as how to use it. The software’s documentation (Documentation) presents the workflow within the software as well as details about each function

Please navigate through the Table of Content to get access to the different sections.
